body.p: uses the DITA Open Toolkit (DITA-OT) to transform DITA maps and topics into an output format. For this purpose, both the DITA Open Toolkit and Ant come bundled in . For more information about the DITA Open Toolkit, see DITA Open Toolkit Documentation.
This section includes information about the built-in DITA transformation scenarios, how to create a DITA OT transformation, and how to customize DITA transformations.
